title: Bubble Cloud Wear Launcher Watchface combination
summary: Mini Launcher + Watch face combo. Try this unique take on Android Wear 2.0 & 1.x
description: (if you only want to use on your phone or tablet, please get the Widgets-Only variant that does not include the watch components: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dyna.logix.bookmarkbubbles.widgets) Get to your apps on your Android Wear watch more easily:► use as extended watch face: scroll horizontally for apps / brightness► or keep using any other watch face and pull app drawer over screen: similar to other mini launchers Bubbles grow with use: more frequently used items stand out from the crowd (optional) ► descriptionHTML:
(if you only want to use on your phone or tablet, please get the Widgets-Only variant that does not include the watch components: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=dyna.logix.bookmarkbubbles.widgets)
 
Get to your apps on your Android Wear watch more easily:
► use as extended watch face: scroll horizontally for apps / brightness
► or keep using any other watch face and pull app drawer over screen: similar to other mini launchers
 
Bubbles grow with use: more frequently used items stand out from the crowd (optional)
 
► Over 500,000 installs ◄
 
2-in-1 app get Bubble Clouds both
► on your → ANDROID WEAR SMARTWATCH
► and on your phone+tablet → HOMESCREEN FOLDERS and WIDGETS
 
REFERENCES
► Featured on Android Police in "25 standalone apps and watchfaces for your Android Wear 2.0-equipped watch": http://bit.ly/AndPolice25AW20
► Business Insider, Android Central, Yahoo tech, Gizmodo, AndroidPit, SlashGear… see http://goo.gl/HG3Vbf
 
COMPATIBILITY
► YES: Android Wear: Huawei, Moto 360, LG GW / GWR / Urbane, ZenWatch 1-3, Sony SW3, Fossil Q…
► NO: Samsung Gear (Tizen)
► NO: "Android 5.1" smartwatches (GT.O8, DZ.O9 etc)
 
2 MODES
► App Drawer (similar to other android wear mini launchers)
► Interactive watch-face (the launcher becomes your watch face)
 
FEATURE HIGHLIGHTS
► Fun+practical: you can fit many more icons → less swiping to find something
► Variable icon sizes → preset or usage based
► Separate apps in groups (favorites+archive pages) → organize
► Watch face with "live" info (date, watch/phone battery, weather, step count + 2.0 complications)
► Dim ambient watch face → lower brightness for theater/night
► Selective ambient: pick what info stays on ambient face
► Sticky open → double tap to keep app on screen (without battery hit)
► Screen lock to prevent accidental touches
► 1-touch voice search
► Favorite contacts screen to start calls, text or email conversations [Premium]
► Brightness control half a swipe away
► Automatic day / night screen brightness management
► Very battery friendly on watch AND phone → Guaranteed: no wake-locks
► Stand-up alert plugin
► New Tasker plugin can control bubbles on watch
► Smart Home automation via HTTP GET/POST command bubbles

MUCH CONTROL OVER LOOK
► Use custom colors and images for background, clock dial and hands
or…
► Apply one of over 70 ready made 1-click themes in 8 downloadable theme packs
► Full icon pack support → use standard Android icon packs to theme your watch
► Smart auto layouts → arrange icons automatically in various layouts
or…
► Full control using the Drag and drop watchface editor
 
ANDROID WEAR 2.0 FEATURES
► Wear 2.0 watch face complications: unlimited number of complications
► Add complications in the app drawer too
► Set background image from complication provider
► Remap hardware button to open app drawer, start dimmed theater mode and more
► Override swipe-to-change-watch-face (not only at the edges!)
► Helps you re-install all 2.0 apps after watch-reset
 
TUTORIAL VIDEOS
► my app has more to offer than might seem on the surface
► app features explained in visual instructions
  
FREE VERSION
► constant development with emphasis on user feedback
► fully customizable favorites cloud (=watch face)
► 2 layouts for the archive cloud (=app drawer) [premium=9]
► 1 complication bubble [premium=no limit]
► 1 tasker bubble [premium=no limit]
► assign function to watch button [premium=assign 2nd press]
► no time limit for the launcher/watchface (some update reminders)
► full support from developer
► no ads
 
USER FORUMS
► Troubleshooting website: http://goo.gl/DHWSqf
► Google+ http://goo.gl/5t8f8U
► Version history at XDA-Developers http://goo.gl/3A1ONK
► Beta http://bit.ly/bubbeta
 
PERMISSIONS
Detailed here: http://goo.gl/UDqoZ2

#BCWKEY
comments: Be the bubble, feel the bubble, and just give the bubble a chance.You can tell that this app is a labor of love. It is one of the only watch faces that truly merges innovation with functionality - not gimmicky and really unleashes the power of Android Wear.   Don't hesitate and get premium to because we need to support developers like this - this guy gets it!   Support is also amazing. Really give it a try and spend time setting it up, you will not be disappointed!   Bumping review for updated version.
Too complicated. Tap the battery percentage bubble and the timer opens, random! Life's too short to figure it all out for me. Thanks anyway and keep up the work.

It's easy ish to navigate, I was hoping it would be a little more interactive but saying that it does what it's supposed to. I think android wear tech has come a long way and this developer is doing a fab job
I love this app. And I just see the surface of the possibilities it has.
recentChanges: "Displaying over other apps" message? It's a new Android 8.0 notification. To remove:
(a wear launcher needs to show over other apps)
Please contact me at bcwhelp@gmail.com before rating low. I respond quickly, fix asap/refund
► Small tweaks after last big update
Please reward my work with 5★ if you like the app. Thank you :)
